name: 21.17-Khmer: Load-into-counting
description: Build a k-mer countgraph from the given sequences

parameters.name: Output filename
parameters.description: The name of the file to write the k-mer countgraph to.

parameters.name: FAST[AQ] input
parameters.description: The names of one or more FAST[AQ] input sequence files.

parameters.name: Unique
parameters.description: Approximate number of unique kmers in the input set

parameters.name: Max memmory
parameters.description: Maximum amount of memory to use for data structure

parameters.name: No big count
parameters.description: The default behaviour is to count past 255 using bigcount. This flag turns bigcount off, limiting counts to 255

parameters.name: Small count
parameters.description: Reduce memory usage by using a smaller counter for individual kmers

parameters.name: Help
parameters.description: Show the help message and exit
